Filling a bug report
====================

First, please, check the `opened tickets <http://www.nagare.org/trac/report/1>`_
to be sure you have found a new bug in Nagare.

To fill in a new bug report:

  1. `create an account <http://www.nagare.org/trac/register>`_ in the Nagare
     Trac if you don't already have one,
  2. `Login <http://www.nagare.org/trac/login>`_ with your account
  3. `create the bug report <http://www.nagare.org/trac/newticket>`_

.. wikiname: BugReport
